title: A Twisted Fate
description: 18+ Adult themes, scenes of a sexual nature and a very addictive family of alpha male demons. Luna has learned exactly what her prophecy details, she now knows why her existence is so important. The fates have one more cruel twist left for Luna, a twist that may mean her choosing between her own life and the life of someone she loves. What would you do if the one thing that would save both the human and the supernatural world actually took your own life away? Luna has some difficult decisions ahead of her including what she wants the most in the world and what the world wants the most from her.
author: Lisa   Barker
